HELL ON WHEELS

Maddie suspect Christian B kept kids’ clothes and swimwear in mobile home

CONVICTED paedophile Christian B, 43, bought the Allegro Bay RV in 2010. Pals said he used it to drive back and forth between Germany, Spain and Portugal and once boasted how he could 'carry children and drugs' inside. Cops found the clothes and swimwear in 2016 along with USB sticks containing images of child sex abuse.

FAMOUS FELINE

Street Cat Named Bob made famous in bestselling book dies

THE cat, who inspired the book and film A Street Cat Named Bob, has sadly died at the age of 14 years. James Bowen, a recovering addict, first met Bob in 2007 when he found him abandoned and injured and they soon became inseparable.
